EmailTemplate.name: 18-CSP-PS for CSPs 2018-Email-Bus Nurture-T0027V.T0027V.Email 1 - Bell Labs WP.T
EmailTemplate.subject: You can take action! Make your LTE network ready for public safety users
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> It’s time for your network to deliver mission-critical LTE for public safety It’s time to take action to make your LTE network ready for mission-critical broadband for public safety users. It’s a proven route to help make the world safer and power your business growth.
Our new white paper explores how operators can develop their commercial LTE networks and analyzes the financial impact of necessary site hardening and build out.
Nokia has the LTE expertise and long experience of working with the government sector to help you meet the mobile broadband needs of public safety users.
It’s time to take action, with Nokia as your expert partner. © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
Nokia: Karaportti 3, 2610 Espoo, Finland Contact Us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> · Privacy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> · Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Twitter}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Linkedin}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Facebook}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Youtube}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Blog}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia’s networks business or its third-party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
